mapper.select: SELECT a.data_request_id as id, b.user_name as username, c.country as region, a.tx_date as date FROM data_request a, user b, country c WHERE a.user_id = b.user_id and a.country_id = c.country_id and a.country_id != 25 and a.type = 0 and a.status = 1 and b.status = 1 and c.status = 1 LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{page}

SELECT a.data_request_id as id, b.user_name as username, c.department as region, a.tx_date as date FROM data_request a, user b, department c WHERE a.user_id = b.user_id and a.department_id = c.department_id and a.country_id = 25 and a.type = 0 and a.status = 1 and b.status = 1 and c.status = 1 LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{page}
select COUNT(data_request_id) from data_request where country_id != 25 and status = 1 and type = 0
select COUNT(data_request_id) from data_request where country_id = 25 and type = 0 and status = 1
